name: Level Down (Mason B.)
description:
This is the third game in my 8 games-8 weeks development marathon. A quick and exciting playthrough, survive waves of enemies as you choose abilities to sacrifice. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

shift - Sprint

WASD (double tap)- thruster Movement

E - Reload Ammo from Ammo Crate

tab - preview/place/destroy shield barrier

Z - use jump ultimate

R - Reload Weapon

Q  - Throw Grenade

Space - Jump

esc - Pause

CC Music Used:

All Music by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/
